text: Coat of arms of the barons of Híjar (1268), descendants of James I of Aragon. Pedro Fernández de Híjar (1245/49-1299) was the first Baron of Híjar, and knight of Order of the Holy Sepulchre. He was the illegitimate son of King James I of Aragon, and Berenguela Fernández (m. 1272). ==Bibliography== * * * ==References== Category:1245 births Category:1299 deaths Pedro Category:Medieval Knights of the Holy Sepulchre
